divs: sighting detailswhen i was about 11-12 years in 2001\02 can't remember the year my mother had a bad fall and we went to the hospital. at around midnight we got out of the taxi at our house and i it was a clear night as i remember. being the only other person in i decided to sit and listen the radio mains powered with headphones on in my room. it must have been past midnight or 1.00am. suddenly the radio station i was listening to disappeared like a hoover or microwave had been switched on next to me. i had the urge to run to my bedroom window i still don't know why i did this perhaps because i thought a helicopter might be passing over. i then looked up and seen the start of a low flying triangle passing at low altitude i don't remember hearing any noise. it had 3 big white lights at each tip and a larger pulsating red one in the middle of it. i watched it glide over other people's homes before it west off into the distance while all i could see was the flashing red light in the far distance. i knew this was not a type of winged aircraft as it would have been dangerously low and the airspeed would have stalled the plane. it was too big to be a helicopter and considering they make noise what i seen didn't.
Summary: Large triangle hovering over house (can't find GMT for time zone)
